content.text: I enjoy dressing up as my favorite characters from comic books and anime.
That sounds like a lot of fun!
It is, it's a great way to express myself creatively.
I love to work with my hands, I've never been one for dressing up though.
What kinds of things do you like to make?
I like to make jewelry, I've also been working on building my own computer.
Oh that's really cool! I'm not very good at working with my hands, I'm more of an artist.
Well, I'm not much of an artist, but I love to read.
Me too! I love to read comics and manga.
I prefer novels, I love to get lost in a good story.
I love to get lost in a good story too, that's why I love comics and manga so much.
I've never read any manga, I've heard good things though.
You should check it out! It's like comics, but they're Japanese.
I will! I'm always looking for new things to read.
Great! I'm sure you'll love it.
